title: HANDMADE BY LADYFORYOU
donations_intro: Over the years, I have supported several Croatian shelters with small gestures – donating bows and scarves I made with love, and I wish to continue helping. Every bow or scarf is not just a fashion accessory, but a small contribution to a big change in the lives of animals waiting for their chance at happiness and a forever home. Our mission is simple: every dog deserves love, care, and a chance for a home. Bows help in photoshoots, attract attention, and give dogs extra charm — and believe me, it makes a difference. Bows are not just a symbol of style, but a symbol of hope. When a dog shines in a photo, it's easier to find its way into someone's heart and home.
card1_desc: I was delighted to make bows for the beautiful little faces in Ogulin, brightening their day and perhaps increasing the chance that a potential adopter notices them – and cannot resist their charming outfit!
card2_desc: I follow the work of these wonderful volunteers near Velika Gorica who help rehome stray animals, so I decided to delight them with a donation of bows. These beautiful little faces deserve to shine in front of the camera and capture someone's heart.
card3_desc: Before one Christmas, I donated some bows to the adorable little faces in Osijek so that during this season of hope, they would be groomed and might catch the eye of a potential adopter – because every dog deserves a warm forever home.
